DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Documentation HIV Infection Between age 8 25 On stable ART least 12 week HIV+ patient Cumulative duration ART least 48 week HIV + patient Healthy child/young adult age race match HIV+ patient HIV control Absence HIV base medical medication history Taking > 800 IU Vitamin D per day Parathyroid Calcium disorder Acute illness active inflammatory condition Chronic illnesses include malignancy , diabetes , CAD Pregnancy lactation Creatinine Clearance < 50 ml/min Hgb < 9.0 g/dL AST ALT > 2.5 upper limit normal
